summary: Completed testing of Enhanced Visual Analytics feature - Backend 100% pass (13/13 tests), Frontend UI fully functional with all 4 tabs working correctly

issues: Loading state ('Analyzing your data...') persists for ~10-15 seconds on first load - may benefit from skeleton loading or progress indicator

critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warning in Insights.js line 15: useEffect has missing dependency 'fetchData' - already wrapped in useCallback so this is a false positive, can be ignored
seed_data_creation: Test user has 1 mood log from 2026-01-22 with mood_rating=7, mood_tag='Happy', sleep_hours=7.5, medication_taken=true
context_for_next_testing_agent: Enhanced Visual Analytics feature fully tested. All 4 tabs (Overview, Patterns, Triggers, Correlations) working. Time range selector (7/30/90 days) working. Export button functional. Empty states display correctly when insufficient data. Backend endpoint /api/mood-logs/analytics/advanced returns proper data structure.

advanced_analytics_endpoint.details: GET /api/mood-logs/analytics/advanced returns patterns, triggers, correlations, day_of_week_analysis, mood_distribution, sleep_mood_correlation, medication_impact, symptom_mood_correlation

overview_tab.details: Summary cards (Average Mood, Total Logs, Consistency, Patterns Found), Mood Trend chart, Mood Distribution chart, Day of Week radar chart all rendering correctly

patterns_tab.details: Identified Patterns section with collapsible UI, Weekly Pattern Analysis grid showing day-by-day breakdown

triggers_tab.details: Identified Triggers section, Symptom Impact on Mood section with impact indicators

correlations_tab.details: Sleep & Mood Correlation chart, Medication Impact cards, Sleep & Mood Over Time dual-axis chart

time_range_selector.details: 7 Days, 30 Days, 90 Days buttons all functional, data refreshes on selection

export_button.details: Export button present and triggers CSV download
